response.original_title: The Best of Beavis and Butt-Head: Law-Abiding Citizens / There Goes The Neighborhood
response.overview: Law-Abiding Citizens: Beavis and Butt-head are not criminals.  They're just innocent teenagers, guilty of trying to have a good time.  Whether they're meeting president Clinton, attempting to "do it" with an undercover prostitute, or Beavis transforming into his unpredictable alter-ego, The Great Cornholio, they prove time and time again that it's not easy enforcing the law on two boys who clearly don't know what the law is.  There Goes The Neighborhood: How would you like to live next door to Beavis and Butt-head?  Don't answer until you've seen these eight classic episodes featuring Beavis and Butt-head's most victimized neighbor, Tom Anderson!
response.tagline: This DVD just might make you want to put a fence around your yard...an electric fence!
response.title: The Best of Beavis and Butt-Head: Law-Abiding Citizens / There Goes The Neighborhood
